merge_before_transcript:
monica: All right people, we're in trouble here. We've only got 12 hours and 36 minutesleft. Move, move, move!
chandler: Monica, I feel like you should have German subtitles.
monica: Joey, speed it up!
joey: I'm sorry, it's the pigs. they're reluctant to get in the blankets!
phoebe_transcript: Monica, how did this happen? I thought you had this all planned out.
